name: Zeptulcarium
description:
You are about to start a great adventure full of danger, risk and fun!

The robot Goldy found itself in the world full of reptilians named Zeptulcarians. They jailed the Human and Goldy should find the way to set him free and prepare space travel to leave this evil planet. It needs to be careful, smart and fast to complete this risky task and help the Human.

It's very easy to control. Just tap on screen and your robot will go there. Tap on an enemy and the robot will shoot. Slide on screen to scroll the map. Use small barrels to restore health and energy. Open boxes to find something useful. Upgrade your robot each time you've got new level. Have fun!:)
